title: BLOG GPT
content:
You are an expert seo blog post writer. You specialize in writing blog posts that rank on the first page of google. Your first task is to create a list of lsi keywords and target keywords that we would have to include in our blog post "How to build a home gym" so that we can rank #1 on google

give me these long-tail keywords and synonyms you mentioned above

now use the lsi keywords, target keywords, long tail keywords and synonyms create and seo optimized blog post heading and include h1-h3 headings that would increase the likeness of ranking and optimizing this blog post. Use markdown format

now write an seo optimized full blog post using the blog post outline generated and use the target keywords, lsi keywords, long tail keywords and synonyms below throughout the article in a natural way. Include tables, charts and lists and always write in markdown format. Aim for 1500 words plus
ADD KEYWORDS

Now create a short seo optimized meta description and title for this article

Create a FAQ for the blog post that was just generated


tell me some low competition keywords in the fitness niche

Make me a bookmarklet that scrapes the titles from a google SERP page, and copies them to clipboard
Extract the keywords from this list of titles


what are some keywords I can rank for on google in the fitness niche to make affiliate commissions and improve my topical authority

what you like? what you dislike? this is what IIIII did
Have your own take (images, quotes, video)
Link TO museums, national libraries, etc

LOGO ON LEONARDO
vector style, A Logo, yellow color, healthy, fitness logo, in a circle
AVATAR LEONARDO
Vector style, A bird, explaining, detailed teacher bird character, realistic

CHATGPT UNIQUE SCRIPT FOR VIDEOS
Can you Convert the following article to a Unique Video Script https://thebalancednutritionist.com/do-keto-acv-gummies-work/

10 sites for traffic
LinkedIn
Quora space(fitnessflixxyt)
medium.com




BUSINESS IDEAS Podcast Integration Platform: Create a platform that seamlessly integrates blogging with podcasting, allowing content creators to easily publish and promote both written and audio content. Provide tools for recording, editing, and distributing podcasts, as well as cross-promotion opportunities between bloggers and podcasters.
Micro-Influencer Blogging Platform: Create a platform specifically tailored for micro-influencers to connect with brands and monetize their content. Provide tools for content creation, collaboration with brands, and analytics tracking to help influencers grow their online presence.
nichenestbloggersnetwork

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCDrivZKHgLTM0AXJPjuUIlQ?sub_confirmation=1

Pretend you're an expert author that specializes in writing online articles. I need you to help me brainstorm articles ideas for the fitness niche. Please create a table that includes the following information in separate columns.  1. Niche   2. Target Audience   3. List of appealing topics.

Now please create 10 attention grabbing titles for an article on the topic of [ENTER TOPIC HERE]. Make sure that the title has high CTR potential and precisely describes the problem the reader is trying to solve or result they're trying to achieve.

Great. Now please write a highly engaging, easy to read article about the following title: [TITLE]. The article must include a strong hook & intro that grabs attention & introduces the problem, it must include objection handling, open loops and concisely explain how to solve the problem from the title.   The style must be: Conversational. The tone must be: Friendly

TRIVIA
Please create a list of five multiple choice trivia questions based on the topic of "little known facts". Please only include questions that are at an intermediate level for this topic and indicate which answer is the correct answer. Please make your response a downloadable CSV file putting all the correct answers in the same column.

Pinterest perplexity AI
List 5 of the top reasons why Bluehost is the best hosting service, including a brief description for each reason. Then create 5 different click enticing pinterest pin titles for each point. Include emoji's at the beginning of each title and do not include the word Bluehost in the title.
